sentences.sContent: ...a huge office tower with aircraft warning beacons on the roof.
sentences.sCn: …一个屋顶有航行警告灯的巨型办公塔。

synos.tran: [水运]灯塔，信号浮标；烽火；指路明灯

phrases.pCn: 无线电信标；无线电指向台

trans.tranCn: 灯塔，信号浮标；烽火；指路明灯
trans.tranOther: a light that is put somewhere to warn or guide people, ships, vehicles, or aircraft
